Method clone()

The objects of this class are cloneable with this method.

Usage

Host$clone(deep = FALSE)

Arguments

deep

Whether to make a deep clone.

Examples

if (FALSE) {
x <- Host$new("example.com")
x
x$host_name
x$domain_name
x$registration_name
x$tld
x$valid()
# x$munge()
x$error
x$error_message
x$ip_address
x$config$config

x <- Host$new("gmail.com", config = list(dns_lookup = "off"))
x$config$config$dns_lookup
x$valid()

x <- Host$new("gmail.com")
x
x$valid()
x$fail()

x <- Host$new("gm ail.com")
x
x$valid()
x$fail()

x <- Host$new("user1")
x$domain_name
x$dns_name
x$registration_name
}
